original_text: And you shall take from these a small number and bind them in the skirts of your robe.
korean_text: 너는 터럭 중에서 조금을 네 옷자락에 싸고

sentences.original_text: And you shall take from these a small number
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 이것들 중에서 소수를 취하고

sentences.original_text: and bind them in the skirts of your robe.
